headline: KKR Acquires Majority Stake in HealthCare Royalty Partners
summary: KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE:KKR) is one of the 11 Best Revenue Growth Stocks to Buy Now. On July 30, KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE:KKR) announced that it has completed its acquisition of a majority ownership stake in HealthCare Royalty Partners (HCRx), which is a middle-market biopharma royalty acquisition company. This deal will help KKR […]
